header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.source: In case no price is setup for this currency (for a product or shipping costs) the shop can calculate the price using a conversion rate from the config
trans-unit.target: In case no price is setup for this currency (for a product or shipping costs) the shop can calculate the price using a conversion rate from the config

trans-unit.source: Sets the number of characters for product description in the list views / search results. When reached the description will be truncated. In order to remove the limit use really high number like 999999
trans-unit.target: Sets the number of characters for product description in the list views / search results. When reached the description will be truncated. In order to remove the limit use really high number like 999999

trans-unit.source: Number of products loaded in an ajax call
trans-unit.target: Number of products loaded in an ajax call

trans-unit.source: This numeric value describes how many products should be added to the bottom of the list when "infinite products loading" ajax call is performed.
trans-unit.target: This numeric value describes how many products should be added to the bottom of the list when "infinite products loading" ajax call is performed.

trans-unit.source: This numeric value describes how many products should be visible on category listing page.
trans-unit.target: This numeric value describes how many products should be visible on category listing page.

trans-unit.source: categories: show category boxes only, product_list: show products only, both: categories and display product list. The http-cache has to be removed to make a change visible.
trans-unit.target: categories: show category boxes only, product_list: show products only, both: categories and display product list. The http-cache has to be removed to make a change visible.

trans-unit.source: If enabled products which are discontinued and out of stock cannot be ordered any more.
trans-unit.target: If enabled products which are discontinued and out of stock cannot be ordered any more.

trans-unit.source: Check packaging units and adjust quantity of discontinued products
trans-unit.target: Check packaging units and adjust quantity of discontinued products

trans-unit.source: If enabled the shop will modify the quantity of discontinued products ordered by a user automatically to the next packaging unit.
trans-unit.target: If enabled the shop will modify the quantity of discontinued products ordered by a user automatically to the next packaging unit.

trans-unit.source: Newsletter only for logged in users
trans-unit.target: Newsletter only for logged in users

trans-unit.source: If enabled only logged in users will see the newsletter box
trans-unit.target: If enabled only logged in users will see the newsletter box

trans-unit.source:
The tabs displayed are depending on the siteaccesses that are configured for your shop. The main tab contains the central configuration options for the default settings that can be set by the shop admin. Make sure to set the country specific configuration as they overwrite the default settings!

In case of problems please check the stored configuration
If you are looking for price and stock management go to price and stock management
trans-unit.target:
The tabs displayed are depending on the siteaccesses that are configured for your shop. The main tab contains the central configuration options for the default settings that can be set by the shop admin. Make sure to set the country specific configuration as they overwrite the default settings!

In case of problems please check the stored configuration
If you are looking for price and stock management go to price and stock management

trans-unit.source: This true|false value determines, if the login process should include a field for providing customer number.
trans-unit.target: This true|false value determines, if the login process should include a field for providing customer number.

trans-unit.source:
Choose which handling of variant products should be taken.
  • SKU_ONLY - if your ERP system uses different SKUs per variant.
  • SKU_AND_VARIANT - if your ERP system uses a combination of SKU and variant code for variants.
trans-unit.target:
Choose which handling of variant products should be taken.
  • SKU_ONLY - if your ERP system uses different SKUs per variant.
  • SKU_AND_VARIANT - if your ERP system uses a combination of SKU and variant code for variants.

trans-unit.source: It defines the maximum number of products to be stored per user for last viewed products.
trans-unit.target: It defines the maximum number of products to be stored per user for last viewed products.

trans-unit.source: If you want to allow pricerequests without customernumber. In this case the customernumber might be provided by a template customernumber (configured in the shop) or provided by the ERP.
trans-unit.target: If you want to allow pricerequests without customernumber. In this case the customernumber might be provided by a template customernumber (configured in the shop) or provided by the ERP.

trans-unit.source: Price providers for product detail page
trans-unit.target: Price providers for product detail page

trans-unit.source: Price providers for product listing pag
trans-unit.target: Price providers for product listing pag

trans-unit.source:
Note: This only applies to Ibexa Commerce Advanced.
Please choose which price calculation engines shall be used for generating prices and stock information.
This configuration works as a chain, so if the first engine fails the second one will be used as a fallback (e.g. in case the ERP is not availbale)
Important note: Price calculations in ERP systems may cause slower responses from the system, depending on the specific complexity.
trans-unit.target:
Note: This only applies to Ibexa Commerce Advanced.
Please choose which price calculation engines shall be used for generating prices and stock information.
This configuration works as a chain, so if the first engine fails the second one will be used as a fallback (e.g. in case the ERP is not availbale)
Important note: Price calculations in ERP systems may cause slower responses from the system, depending on the specific complexity.

trans-unit.source: Recalculate prices using the ERP after (seconds)
trans-unit.target: Recalculate prices using the ERP after (seconds)

trans-unit.source: Information from the ERP is cached in order to reduce the traffic towards the ERP. Please use a syntax "1 hour".
trans-unit.target: Information from the ERP is cached in order to reduce the traffic towards the ERP. Please use a syntax "1 hour".

trans-unit.source: reCAPTCHA script will be run asynchronously
trans-unit.target: reCAPTCHA script will be run asynchronously

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the script will be executed asynchronously as soon as it is available.
trans-unit.target: It specifies that the script will be executed asynchronously as soon as it is available.

trans-unit.source: reCAPTCHA script will be run after the page has loaded
trans-unit.target: reCAPTCHA script will be run after the page has loaded

trans-unit.source: It specifies that the script is executed when the page has finished parsing. The defer attribute may be specified even if the async attribute is specified, to cause legacy Web browsers that only support defer (and not async) to fall back to the defer behavior instead of the synchronous blocking behavior that is the default.
trans-unit.target: It specifies that the script is executed when the page has finished parsing. The defer attribute may be specified even if the async attribute is specified, to cause legacy Web browsers that only support defer (and not async) to fall back to the defer behavior instead of the synchronous blocking behavior that is the default.

trans-unit.source: Base currency of the shop in general (is used for the fields "product unit price" and "fallback shipping price". The base currency will be used for the automatic currency conversion)
trans-unit.target: Base currency of the shop in general (is used for the fields "product unit price" and "fallback shipping price". The base currency will be used for the automatic currency conversion)

trans-unit.source: This currency is used as fallback currency, if the siteaccess specific configuration is not configured (e.g. per siteaccess)
trans-unit.target: This currency is used as fallback currency, if the siteaccess specific configuration is not configured (e.g. per siteaccess)

trans-unit.source:
Determines which country shall be used as a default.
Please use the country code such as "DE"
trans-unit.target:
Determines which country shall be used as a default.
Please use the country code such as "DE"

trans-unit.source: Use a template contactnumber for this shop
trans-unit.target: Use a template contactnumber for this shop

trans-unit.source:
A template contact number is used if a customer does not have a customer and contact number from the ERP.
The template contact numbers can be defined for each country
trans-unit.target:
A template contact number is used if a customer does not have a customer and contact number from the ERP.
The template contact numbers can be defined for each country

trans-unit.source: Use a template debitornumber for this shop
trans-unit.target: Use a template debitornumber for this shop

trans-unit.source:
A template debitor customer number is used, if a customer does not have a customer number from the ERP.
The template debitor customer numbers can be defined for each country
trans-unit.target:
A template debitor customer number is used, if a customer does not have a customer number from the ERP.
The template debitor customer numbers can be defined for each country

trans-unit.source:
Choose which user interface shall be used for ordering variants on the product detail page.
  • B2B - this interface is optimized for ordering more than one product onces.
  • B2C - this interface allows ordering for one product only, but is more user friendly and modern.
trans-unit.target:
Choose which user interface shall be used for ordering variants on the product detail page.
  • B2B - this interface is optimized for ordering more than one product onces.
  • B2C - this interface allows ordering for one product only, but is more user friendly and modern.

trans-unit.target: Timeout towards the ERP-System in seconds

trans-unit.target: Timeout (ERP) for the communication with the Web-Connector in seconds

trans-unit.target: Password for the communication with the Web-Connector service

trans-unit.source: The URL points to your Web-Connector System installed near by your ERP system. Please use a https connection and make sure that the shop can access this ip and port only!
trans-unit.target: The URL points to your Web-Connector System installed near by your ERP system. Please use a https connection and make sure that the shop can access this ip and port only!

trans-unit.target: Timeout (Web-Service) for the communication with the Web-Connector in seconds

trans-unit.target: User name for the communication with the Web-Connector service
